hero.title: Hi, I'm Nicolás
hero.skills: JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, Nest.js, Express.js, Node.js, Docker, Postgress, Mysql and more.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Fullstack Developer with over 3 years of experience in Web and Software Development. My expertise spans both frontend and backend technologies. On the frontend, I specialize in React.js, Next.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, and Material UI. On the backend, I have extensive experience with Node.js, Express.js, NestJS, GraphQL, REST APIs, Laravel, and Ruby on Rails. For databases, I work with MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL. Additionally, I am skilled in DevOps and tools such as Docker, Git, CI/CD, GitHub Actions, Linux, and AWS. Based in Neuquén, Argentina, I am passionate about building scalable and efficient solutions and am open to remote opportunities.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.sub_title: I am here to help you

description.paragraph_1: I am a Fullstack Developer with over 3 years of experience in Web and Software Development. My expertise spans both frontend and backend technologies. On the frontend, I specialize in React.js, Next.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, and Material UI. On the backend, I have extensive experience with Node.js, Express.js, NestJS, GraphQL, REST APIs, Laravel, and Ruby on Rails. For databases, I work with MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL. Additionally, I am skilled in DevOps and tools such as Docker, Git, CI/CD, GitHub Actions, Linux, and AWS. Based in Neuquén, Argentina, I am passionate about building scalable and efficient solutions and am open to remote opportunities.
description.paragraph_2: I enjoy learning new technologies and constantly improving my skills. I consider myself proactive, responsible, and committed to my work. I always seek the best way to solve problems and add value to the projects I participate in.
description.paragraph_3: In my free time, I enjoy reading, sports, and cooking. I like to stay updated on the latest trends in technology and software development. I also enjoy sharing my knowledge and learning from other professionals in the field.
description.paragraph_4: Additionally, I have 7 years of international experience in the hospitality sector as a cook and kitchen assistant, having worked in New Zealand, Sweden, Germany, and Australia. This experience has helped me develop adaptability, problem-solving skills, and the ability to work under pressure.
description.paragraph_5: Working in diverse environments has also enhanced my ability to integrate into new cultures, collaborate with multicultural teams, and quickly adapt to different dynamics and work expectations.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.sub_title: Some of my most recent projects
portfolio.description: Here you can see some of my most recent projects. Each one represents a unique challenge and an opportunity to apply my skills and knowledge in developing effective and attractive solutions. I hope you enjoy them and feel inspired to learn more about my work.

cookies_policy.title: Cookies Policy
cookies_policy.description: This policy explains what cookies are, how we use them on this website, and your options regarding their use.
cookies_policy.whatAreCookiesDescription: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work, or work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the site owners.
cookies_policy.typesOfCookiesTitle: What types of cookies do we use?
cookies_policy.necessaryCookies: Necessary cookies: These are essential for the website to function properly.
cookies_policy.analyticsCookies: Analytics cookies: We use Google Analytics to collect anonymous information about how the site is used to improve it. These cookies are only activated if you give your consent.
cookies_policy.controlCookiesDescription: You can accept or reject analytics cookies from the banner displayed when you enter the site. You can also delete or block cookies from your browser settings.
cookies_policy.changeChoiceDescription: If you want to change your current choice, you can do so using the following button:

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: If you have any questions, comments, or would like to discuss a potential project, feel free to reach out. I am always open to new opportunities and collaborations. You can contact me through the form below or via my social media channels.

form.zoom_google: Book a Zoom or Google meeting

not_found.title: Oops! Page Not Found
not_found.description: It seems the page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Please check the URL or navigate back to the homepage to continue exploring.

error.title: Something Went Wrong
error.description: Oops! It seems something went wrong while loading the page. Please try refreshing the page or come back later. If the issue persists, feel free to contact us for assistance.

work_in_progress.title: We are working on it!
work_in_progress.description: This section is currently under construction. We are working hard to bring you exciting content and updates. Please check back soon, and thank you for your patience and understanding!

footer.description: I am <mark>Nicolás Fernández</mark>, a Fullstack Developer with over 3 years of experience in Web and Software Development. Specializing in <mark>JavaScript</mark>, <mark>TypeScript</mark>, <mark>React.js</mark>, <mark>Next.js</mark>, <mark>Nest.js</mark>, <mark>Express.js</mark>, <mark>Node.js</mark>, <mark>Postgress</mark>, <mark>Mysql</mark> and Devops practices such <mark>Docker</mark> and <mark>Github Actions</mark>. Currently based in Neuquén, Argentina, and open to remote projects. I invite you to learn more about my skills, experience, and professional journey.

cookies_banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. By continuing to browse, you agree to the use of cookies.
